sys_ux_client_script.name: New client script 1

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_ae636c1a83f76650a16a74f6feaad37c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">a961801283b76650a16a74f6feaad3c8</macroponent><name>New client script 1</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // --- Part 1: Calculate the greeting ---
    const currentHour = new Date().getHours();
    let greeting = '';

    if (currentHour < 12) {
        greeting = 'Good Morning';
    } else if (currentHour < 17) {
        // 17 represents 5:00 PM
        greeting = 'Good Afternoon';
    } else {
        greeting = 'Good Evening';
    }

    // --- Part 2: Get the user's name ---
    // This accesses the built-in session object to get the user's first name.
    const userName = api.context.session.user.firstName;

    // --- Part 3: Combine them and update the Client State Parameter ---
    const personalizedGreeting = `${greeting}, ${userName}`;
    api.setState('GreetingMessage', personalizedGreeting);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-07 09:20:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>ae636c1a83f76650a16a74f6feaad37c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New client script 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Vendor Onboarding" source="x_1821895_vendor_a">cf3b77a1837fa250a16a74f6feaad38b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Vendor Onboarding">cf3b77a1837fa250a16a74f6feaad38b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ae636c1a83f76650a16a74f6feaad37c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-07 09:37:18</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
